name: Fast Moto City: Racing Street
description:
Fast Moto City: Racing Street is full of fun, make you feel the extreme racing trip. Compete with crazy opponents and become the first motorcycle driver to cross the finish line.Experience the thrill of superbike driving through a variety of difficult tracks. Explore the rugged terrain and the unidentified traffic conditions of the city. Start your own real adventure as a competitive motorcycle rider. Beyond rival motorbikes and show you cool skills to become the most dazzling champion on the road.
Features:
- Real motorcycle experience
- Incredible graphics
- Simple and smooth control
- Endless race to improve your driving skills
- Unlock all kinds of cool motorcycles
- Different modes
